summary: Hong Kong International Airport, located on Chek Lap Kok island, is a major global airport. It opened in 1998 and has become the world's top cargo airport and one of the busiest passenger airports. The airport features one of the largest terminal buildings globally. It operates 24/7 and serves as a hub for several airlines, including Cathay Pacific and Hong Kong Airlines. HKIA contributes significantly to Hong Kong's economy, employing around 60,000 people. In 2015, it handled nearly 69 million passengers, making it one of the world's top airports for passenger traffic.
title: Hong Kong International Airport
